name: Endeavour Flight Training, Inc.
about: Endeavour Flight Training, Inc., a Certified Cessna Pilot Center, is dedicated to providing exemplary flight and ground instruction for students seeking primary and advanced flight training. Located at Opa-Locka Airport in Miami, Florida, the school utilizes the revolutionary Cessna Computer-Based Instruction System and state-of-the-art Cessna Skyhawk 172 SP aircraft, known for their unparalleled safety record. Founded by ATP Pilot and CFII/MEI Freddy Antolinez, Endeavour aims to elevate pilot education with integrated flight and ground school lessons designed for maximum enjoyment and knowledge retention. The school offers various programs, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, and ATP certifications, all within a supportive and professional environment. Whether your goal is to fly commercially or personally, Endeavour Flight Training is committed to making your flight training easy and enjoyable.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
